cpsTest.title: CPS Test (Click Speed Test)
cpsTest.subtitle: Test Your Clicking Speed (CPS)
cpsTest.description: Curious how fast you can click? Use this online CPS test to challenge your clicking speed in 1s, 5s, or 10s modes.

metadata.title: CPS Test | Click Speed Test | FreeFocusGames
metadata.description: Free online CPS Test (Clicks Per Second). Test your mouse clicking speed in 1s, 3s, 5s, 10s modes. Check your ranking among gamers. No download needed!
metadata.keywords: CPS Test, click speed test, mouse speed test, jitter click test, 1 second cps test
metadata.ogTitle: CPS Test - Challenge Your Click Speed
metadata.ogDescription: Challenge your clicking limit! Online CPS test to see how many times you can click per second.

howToPlay.description: CPS Test measures how fast you can click in a given time. It's simple:
howToPlay.step2: Get ready and click the gray area as fast as you can.
howToPlay.step4: See your CPS score and rank after the test.

gaming.title: Gaming Performance
gaming.description: High CPS is crucial for combos and rapid fire in Minecraft (PvP), FPS, and MOBA games.

consistency.title: Consistency Training
consistency.description: Maintaining a steady click rate is a sign of a pro player.

finger.title: Finger Agility
finger.description: Regular practice enhances finger muscle strength and endurance.

what.question: What is a good CPS score?
what.answer: Average CPS is around 6-7. Above 8 is excellent, and pro players or jitter clickers can reach 10+.

improve.question: How to improve CPS?
improve.answer: Try techniques like Butterfly Clicking or Jitter Clicking. Relax your wrist to avoid stiffness.

record.question: What is the world record?
record.answer: Records vary by time, but for 1s tests, some top records exceed 20 clicks.

safe.question: Can high speed clicking cause injury?
safe.answer: Yes, prolonged high-speed clicking can cause strain or RSI. Practice moderately and rest if you feel pain.
